scripts.build:
./deps/build.sh && rollup src/wasmc.js --file wasmc.g.js --format cjs --name wasmc --sourcemap --banner '#!/usr/bin/env node
' && uglifyjs --compress --mangle --ecma 7 -o wasmc --source-map content=wasmc.g.js.map,includeSources=false -- wasmc.g.js && node misc/fixup-sourcemap.js wasmc.map && chmod +x wasmc
scripts.build-g:
rollup src/wasmc.js --file wasmc.g.js --format cjs --name wasmc --sourcemap --banner '#!/usr/bin/env node
' && chmod +x wasmc.g.js
scripts.build-w:
rollup src/wasmc.js --file wasmc.g.js --format cjs --name wasmc --sourcemap --banner '#!/usr/bin/env node
' --watch
